name: Guards of the Gate
description: Guards of the Gate is a roguelike turn-based game on hexagonal fields. You control a team of heroes aka Guards of the Gate, who are trying to save the world from the evil Dragon Lord.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX9 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1500 MB available space
